purpleculture_pinyin:
huái
name of a river
название реки
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 隹 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
淮河 [ huái hé ]: Huai River, main river of east China, between the Yellow River 黄河
淮海 [ huái hǎi ]: Huaihai, economic hub around Xuzhou 徐州 , including parts of Jiangsu, Shandong, Henan and Anhui provinces
秦淮 [ qín huái ]: Qinhuai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江苏
秦淮区 [ qín huái qū ]: Qinhuai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江苏
淮北 [ huái běi ]: Huaibei prefecture-level city in Anhui
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow
humanum_full_description_en:
Jia Jin inscription starts with " water " and "隹" sound. " Huai " is the name of the water. "Shuowen": "Huai, the water flows out of Nanyang Ping's Tongbai Dafu Mountain, and enters the sea in the southeast. From the water, the sound of the bird." "Erya. "Shishui": "The river, the river, the Huai, and the economy are the four dunes. The four dunes are the ones who originated the sea." The whole sentence refers to the Yangtze River, the Yellow River, the Huai River, and the Jishui are collectively called the Sidu, and all flow into the Sidu after its origin. The sea. The Huai River originates from Tongbai Mountain in Henan Province, flows east through Anhui Province, enters Jiangsu Province, and flows east to the sea. Later, because the Yellow River flew south, the Huai River's way into the sea was taken, and it flowed into Hongze Lake, and then through Gaoyou Lake and Shaobo Lake to Sanjiangying, Jiangdu County, Jiangsu Province, and into the Yangtze River.

Oracle bone inscriptions are used as place names, Collection 41762: "Wang stepped on Huai, died (no disaster)."

Bronze writing is used as the original meaning, referring to Huai Shui. Jufu Yingai: "I am even in Huai." There is also the term "Huaiyi", which collectively refers to the ethnic minorities in the Huai River Basin, also known as "Huai Rong".彔卣: "Huai corpses (barbarian) dare to attack the inner country", which means that Huaiyi dares to attack the inland. "Shang Shu. Fei Oath: "Huaiyi and Xu Rong are both prosperous." The whole sentence refers to the ethnic minorities in the Huaishui area and the Rong people in Xuzhou who have risen up to make chaos.

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period were used as the original meaning, referring to Huai Shui, "Shangbo Bamboo Book II. "Rong Chengshi" Jian 25: "Yu Tonghuai and Xin (Yi), the sea of East Zhuo, so Jing (Qing) state, Juzhou can only be located." The whole sentence refers to Yu dredging the Huai River and Yi River, Lead them to flow eastward into the sea, so Qingzhou and Juzhou can be used as residences. Dayu's management of Huaishui and Yishui Rivers can also be found in the handed down documents, "Shangshu. "Yugong": "Huaiyi Qiyi, Mengyu Qiyi." Kong Anguo Chuan: "Two waters have been ruled, and two mountains are ready for art."

Han silk script is also used as the original meaning, referring to Huai Shui. "Mawangdui Silk Book. Warring States Political Strategist Book. Lines 210-211 of the Chapter of the King of Yan: "The husband adds the Song Dynasty to Huaibei, which is a powerful country, and the combination of Qi is Yiqiye." The whole sentence refers to the place north of the Huai River in the Kingdom of Song and Chu. Together, it is worthy of a powerful country, and the annexation of Qi State is tantamount to adding another Qi State.
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The Jia Jin inscription starts with " water ", the sound of "隹", and the name of the water, which is the Huai River.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「水」，「隹」聲。「淮」是水名，《說文》：「淮，水出南陽平氏桐柏大復山，東南入海。從水，隹聲。」《爾雅．釋水》：「江、河、淮、濟為四瀆。四瀆者，發原注海者也。」全句指長江、黃河、淮水、濟水合稱為四瀆，四瀆發源後都流入大海。按淮河發源於河南省桐柏山，東流經安徽省，入江蘇省，本來東流入海。後因黃河南竄，淮河入海之道被奪，因而流入洪澤湖，再經高郵湖、邵伯湖，到江蘇省江都縣三江營流入長江。

　　甲骨文用作地名，《合集》41762：「王步于淮，亡(無)災。」

　　金文用作本義，指淮水。駒父盨蓋：「我乃至于淮。」另有「淮夷」一詞，統指淮水流域的少數民族，又稱為「淮戎」。彔卣：「淮尸(夷)敢伐內國」，指淮夷膽敢攻伐內陸。《尚書．費誓》：「徂茲淮夷、徐戎並興」，全句指現在淮水一帶的少數民族、徐州之間的戎人都起來作亂。

　　戰國竹簡用作本義，指淮水，《上博竹書二．容成氏》簡25：「禹通淮與忻(沂)，東注之海，於是乎競(青)州、莒州始可處也。」全句指禹疏通了淮水與沂水，引導它們向東流入大海，於是乎青州、莒州開始可以用作居所了。大禹治理淮水、沂水的事亦見於傳世文獻，《尚書．禹貢》：「淮沂其乂，蒙羽其藝。」孔安國傳：「二水已治，二山已可種藝。」

　　漢帛書亦用作本義，指淮水。《馬王堆帛書．戰國縱橫家書．謂燕王章》第210-211行：「夫以宋加之淮北，強萬乘之國也，而齊兼之，是益齊也。」全句指以宋國和楚國淮水以北的地方加起來，抵得上一個強大的國家，而齊國吞併了它，等於增加了一個齊國。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「水」，「隹」聲，水名，即淮河。

淮
Pinyin: huái
English Definition: name of a river
Total strokes: 11; Radical: 水
Pictophonetic: 隹 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow

秦淮 [ qín huái ]: Qinhuai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江苏
秦淮区 [ qín huái qū ]: Qinhuai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江苏

淮字的基本解释

淮
huái
〔淮河〕水名，源于中国河南省桐柏山，流经安徽、江苏两省入洪泽湖。简称“淮”，如“淮北”。“淮南”。

淮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huái］
［《廣韻》户乖切，平皆，匣。］
(1)水名。即淮河，我国大河之一。源出河南省桐柏山，东流经河南、安徽等省到江苏省入洪泽湖。洪泽湖以下，主流出三河经高邮湖由江都县三江营入长江。全长约1000公里，流域面积18.7万平方公里。下游原有入海河道，公元1194年黄河夺淮后，河道淤高，遂逐渐以入江为主。解放前水利失修，灾害严重。解放后进行全面治理。
(2)以指两淮地区。
(3)汇聚。
(4)姓。见《通志·氏族五》。

淮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淮； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页631第14
【唐韻】戸乖切【集韻】【韻會】乎乖切，?音懷。水名。【說文】水出南陽平氏桐柏大復山，東南入海。【風俗通·山澤篇】淮，均也。均其務也。【春秋·說題辭】淮者，均其勢也。【釋名】淮，圍也。圍繞揚州分界，東至於海也。【周禮·夏官·職方氏】靑州，其川淮泗。【書·禹貢】導淮自桐柏。　又水出漢中。【前漢·地理志】漢中郡房陵縣淮山，淮水所出。　又淮安，郡名。【廣輿記】秦屬九江郡，曰淮隂。漢曰臨淮，晉曰山陽，隋唐曰楚州，宋曰淮安。　又【韻補】叶胡隈切，音回。【左傳·昭十二年】有酒如淮，有肉如坻。寡君中此，爲諸侯師。一說淮讀爲濰叶韻。　又叶虛欺切，音熙。【顏延之詩】惜無爵雉化，何用充江淮。去國還故里，迷門樹蓬藜。

淮字的源字形

淮字的起名意思

：指水名，淮水，源于中国河南省桐柏山；引申为大的含义。

Huai
Basic explanation of words
Huai
huái
[Huaihe] The name of the water originated from Tongbai Mountain in Henan Province, China, and flows through Anhui and Jiangsu provinces into Hongze Lake. Abbreviated as "Huai", such as "Huaibei". "Huainan".
Huai
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huái］
["Guangyun" households are obediently cut, flat, boxed. ]
(1) Water name. Namely the Huai River, one of the big rivers in our country. It originates from Tongbai Mountain in Henan Province, and flows eastward through Henan, Anhui and other provinces to Jiangsu Province and enters Hongze Lake. Below Hongze Lake, the mainstream flows from Sanhe to the Yangtze River via Gaoyou Lake from Sanjiangying in Jiangdu County. The total length is about 1,000 kilometers, and the drainage area is 187,000 square kilometers. The lower reaches of the original river into the sea, after the Yellow River captured the Huaihe River in 1194 AD, the river was silted up, and the river gradually became the main stream. Before liberation, water conservancy was in disrepair and disasters were serious. Comprehensive governance after liberation.
(2) To refer to the Lianghuai area.
(3) Convergence.
(4) Last name. See "Tongzhi·Clan Five".
Huai
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　huai; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 631 14
[Tang Yun] Be obediently cut [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Almost obediently cut,? Yinhuai. Water name. [Said the text] Water flows out of Nanyang Pingshi Tongbai Dafu Mountain, and enters the sea in the southeast. [Fun Tong · Shan Ze Chapter] Huai, all also. It's all its business. [Spring and Autumn·Speaking of the title] Huai people are equally powerful. [Release name] Huai, Wei Ye. Around the boundary of Yangzhou, as far as the sea in the east. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Zhifang Family】Qianzhou, its Chuanhuaisi. 【Book·Yugong】Guide Huai from Tongbai.　The water flows out of Hanzhong again. [Pre-Han·Geography] Hanzhong County, Fangling County, Huaishan, Huaishui.　Huai'an, the county name. [Guang Yu Ji] Qin belongs to Jiujiang County, and it is called Huaiyin. It is called Linhuai in the Han Dynasty, Shanyang in the Jin Dynasty, Chuzhou in the Sui and Tang Dynasties, and Huai'an in the Song Dynasty.　[Rhyme Filling] Ye Hukuan cut, and the sound returned. [Zuo Zhuan·Twelve Years of Zhao] There is wine like Huai, and there is meat like Qi. Among the widows, he is the master of the princes. It is said that Huai is pronounced as Wei Ye Yun.　Ye Xu deceives and cuts again, Yinxi. [Poems of Yan Yanzhi] If you cherish no pheasant, why use it to fill Jianghuai. Going to the country to return to the hometown, the lost tree Pengliu.
Huai
Source glyph
Huai
Name meaning
: Refers to the name of the water, Huai Shui, originated from Tongbai Mountain in Henan Province, China; extended to a larger meaning.
淮
形声字。水(氵)表意,甲骨文仅以一条曲线代表河流,金文和小篆在曲线两侧增添了浪花;隹(zhui )表声,佳像鸟,表
示淮河两岸鸟多。本义是淮河。
淮河,发源于河南,流经安徽人江苏。
~北 ~海 ~河 ~剧~南 ~阴 江~ 两~
huái
江~河汉
准
淮。
“隶
Хуай
Пиктофонетические символы.
Вода (氵) означает, что надписи на костях оракула используют только кривую для представления реки, а надписи и маленькие печати добавляют волны по обе стороны кривой; чжуи (чжуи) выражает звук, как птица, что означает, что по обе стороны реки Хуай обитает много птиц.
Первоначальное значение - Хуайхэ.
Река Хуай берет свое начало в провинции Хэнань и течет через Цзянсу из Аньхоя.
~ Север ~ Море ~ Река ~ драма ~ Юг ~ Иньцзян ~ Два ~
Цзян ~ Хехан
квази
Хуай.
"писец
huái
I собств.
1) геогр. (сокр. вм. 淮河) р. Хуайхэ
淮南 (北) район к югу (северу) от Хуайхэ
2) Хуай (фамилия)
II гл.
